article_title: Sysco: merger with US Foods may take longer than expected
article_text:
Sysco Corp. on Thursday said its merger with rival US Foods Inc. may not be completed this quarter as it had expected, but said that the review of the deal by the Federal Trade Commission is on track.

Sysco said it now expects the deal, which would unite the two biggest food distributors in the U.S., to close late this quarter or in the fourth quarter. The FTC's investigation, which began in February, is on track, but "the...
